column4: and Tayebad; also known as Tāyebāt and Ţayyebāt) is a city and capital of Taybad County
column10: 230 families. Taybad is near the border with Afghanistan
column11: and there is an official crossing point to Islam Qala in Afghanistan. Majority of population are Persian Sunnis.

column1: Melons and watermelons are the souvenirs of Taybad. Taybad has a suitable climate for cultivating these fruits compared to other parts of Iran.
